content: these are basic instructions for a textured hexagon pattern to be used as a temperature blanket but can also be used for a scrappy blanket as well i used 11 colours for my temperature range to match the decor of my room there are no instructions for colour range or amount of yarn needed as that will rely your specific temperatures and personal choice each motif should be 7cm wide using 4ply yarn finished blanket size - approx 114 x 164cm instructions are in uk terms pdf pattern only
